role.argrole: thing in which arg0 plays leading role

example.parse: (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 张曼玉) (PU 、) (NR 梁朝伟)) (VP (VV 主演))) (DEC 的))) (NP-TTL (PU 《) (ADJP (JJ 花样)) (NP (NN 年华)) (PU 》))) (PU ，) (VP (MSP 所) (VP (VV 呈现) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-2))))) (DEC 的)))) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (DNP (NP (NT 六○年代)) (DEG 的)) (NP-PN (NR 香港)) (NP (NN 风貌)))))
